text: James Simpson Lord (December 21, 1875 – July 8, 1932) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Charlotte County from 1925 to 1930. He also held a position as Imperial Kalif (vice president) for the Ku Klux Klan of Kanada. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1875 births Category:1932 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs Category:Ku Klux Klan members
title: James S. Lord
